name: rankly
content:
rankly adverb
(VERY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of something bad) completely or extremely: Looking at any page of the text it is clear that line after line is rankly plagiarized. These proposals are rankly opportunistic and dangerously short-sighted.
More examplesFewer examplesThat's rankly absurd.They were rankly hypocritical, often ignoring their instincts in order to sell more newspapers.This is an indication that your company is rankly dishonest and simply taking advantage of you.

rankly adverb
(SMELL)
in a way that smells or tastes very unpleasant: The open packet smells rankly of decay. I remember the juice tasting rankly of the metal container.
